etymologies: late 17th century: perhaps from obsolete scorpene, via Latin from Greek skorpaina, denoting a kind of fish

definitions: a chiefly marine fish of the northern hemisphere, with a broad flattened head and spiny scales and fins.

notes.text: Cottidae and related families: many genera and numerous species, including the bullheads

shortDefinitions: chiefly marine fish of northern hemisphere, with broad flattened head and spiny scales and fins
